006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup.flexmark; // NOPMD AST processor

008import com.vladsch.flexmark.formatter.Formatter;
009import com.vladsch.flexmark.formatter.MarkdownWriter;
010import com.vladsch.flexmark.formatter.NodeFormatter;
011import com.vladsch.flexmark.formatter.NodeFormatterContext;
012import com.vladsch.flexmark.formatter.NodeFormatterFactory;
013import com.vladsch.flexmark.formatter.NodeFormattingHandler;
014import com.vladsch.flexmark.html.HtmlRenderer;
015import com.vladsch.flexmark.html.HtmlWriter;
016import com.vladsch.flexmark.html.renderer.NodeRenderer;
017import com.vladsch.flexmark.html.renderer.NodeRendererContext;
018import com.vladsch.flexmark.html.renderer.NodeRendererFactory;
019import com.vladsch.flexmark.html.renderer.NodeRenderingHandler;
020import com.vladsch.flexmark.html2md.converter.FlexmarkHtmlConverter;
021import com.vladsch.flexmark.html2md.converter.HtmlMarkdownWriter;
022import com.vladsch.flexmark.html2md.converter.HtmlNodeConverterContext;
023import com.vladsch.flexmark.html2md.converter.HtmlNodeRenderer;
024import com.vladsch.flexmark.html2md.converter.HtmlNodeRendererFactory;
025import com.vladsch.flexmark.html2md.converter.HtmlNodeRendererHandler;
026import com.vladsch.flexmark.parser.InlineParser;
027import com.vladsch.flexmark.parser.InlineParserExtension;
028import com.vladsch.flexmark.parser.InlineParserExtensionFactory;
029import com.vladsch.flexmark.parser.LightInlineParser;
030import com.vladsch.flexmark.parser.Parser;
031import com.vladsch.flexmark.util.ast.Node;
032import com.vladsch.flexmark.util.ast.NodeVisitorBase;
033import com.vladsch.flexmark.util.data.DataHolder;
034import com.vladsch.flexmark.util.data.DataKey;
035import com.vladsch.flexmark.util.data.MutableDataHolder;
036import com.vladsch.flexmark.util.sequence.BasedSequence;
037import com.vladsch.flexmark.util.sequence.CharSubSequence;
038
039import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup.IMarkupString;
040
041import org.jsoup.nodes.Element;
042
043import java.util.Collections;
044import java.util.LinkedList;
045import java.util.List;
046import java.util.Set;
047import java.util.function.Predicate;
048import java.util.regex.Matcher;
049import java.util.regex.Pattern;
050
051import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
052
053/**
054 * Extension that adds support for insert anchors, used in OSCAL statements, and
055 * applicable more generally in other Metaschema-based models.
056 */
057public class InsertAnchorExtension
058    implements Parser.ParserExtension, HtmlRenderer.HtmlRendererExtension,
059    Formatter.FormatterExtension, FlexmarkHtmlConverter.HtmlConverterExtension {
060  private static final DataKey<Boolean> ENABLE_INLINE_INSERT_ANCHORS
061      = new DataKey<>("ENABLE_INLINE_INSERT_ANCHORS", true);
062  private static final DataKey<Boolean> ENABLE_RENDERING = new DataKey<>("ENABLE_RENDERING", true);
063
064  /**
065   * Construct a new extension instance.
066   *
067   * @return the instance
068   */
069  public static InsertAnchorExtension newInstance() {
070    return new InsertAnchorExtension();
071  }
072
073  @Override
074  public void parserOptions(MutableDataHolder options) {
075    // do nothing
076  }
077
078  @Override
079  public void rendererOptions(MutableDataHolder options) {
080    // do nothing
081  }
082
083  @Override
084  public void extend(HtmlRenderer.Builder rendererBuilder, String rendererType) {
085    rendererBuilder.nodeRendererFactory(new InsertAnchorNodeRenderer.Factory());
086  }
087
088  @Override
089  public void extend(Parser.Builder parserBuilder) {
090    if (ENABLE_INLINE_INSERT_ANCHORS.get(parserBuilder)) {
091      parserBuilder.customInlineParserExtensionFactory(new InsertAnchorInlineParser.Factory());
092    }
093  }
094
095  @Override
096  public void extend(Formatter.Builder builder) {
097    builder.nodeFormatterFactory(new InsertAnchorFormatter.Factory());
098  }
099
100  @Override
101  public void extend(FlexmarkHtmlConverter.Builder builder) {
102    builder.htmlNodeRendererFactory(new InsertAnchorHtmlNodeRenderer.Factory());
103  }
104
105  private static class InsertAnchorOptions {
106    public final boolean enableInlineInsertAnchors;
107    public final boolean enableRendering;
108
109    public InsertAnchorOptions(DataHolder options) {
110      enableInlineInsertAnchors = ENABLE_INLINE_INSERT_ANCHORS.get(options);
111      enableRendering = ENABLE_RENDERING.get(options);
112    }
113  }
114
115  private static class InsertAnchorNodeRenderer implements NodeRenderer {
116    private final InsertAnchorOptions options;
117
118    public InsertAnchorNodeRenderer(DataHolder options) {
119      this.options = new InsertAnchorOptions(options);
120    }
121
122    @Override
123    public Set<NodeRenderingHandler<?>> getNodeRenderingHandlers() {
124      return Collections.singleton(new NodeRenderingHandler<>(InsertAnchorNode.class, this::render));
125    }
126
127    @SuppressWarnings("unused")
128    protected void render(InsertAnchorNode node, NodeRendererContext context, HtmlWriter html) {
129      if (options.enableRendering) {
130        html.attr("type", node.getType()).attr("id-ref", node.getIdReference()).withAttr().tagVoid("insert");
131      }
132    }
133
134    public static class Factory implements NodeRendererFactory {
135
136      @Override
137      public NodeRenderer apply(DataHolder options) {
138        return new InsertAnchorNodeRenderer(options);
139      }
140    }
141  }
142
143  private static class InsertAnchorInlineParser implements InlineParserExtension {
144    private static final Pattern PATTERN = Pattern.compile("\\{\\{\\s*insert:\\s*([^\\s]+),\\s*([^\\s]+)\\s*\\}\\}");
145
146    public InsertAnchorInlineParser(@SuppressWarnings("unused") LightInlineParser inlineParser) {
147      // do nothing
148    }
149
150    @Override
151    public void finalizeDocument(InlineParser inlineParser) {
152      // do nothing
153    }
154
155    @Override
156    public void finalizeBlock(InlineParser inlineParser) {
157      // do nothing
158    }
159
160    @Override
161    public boolean parse(LightInlineParser inlineParser) {
162      if (inlineParser.peek() == '{') {
163        BasedSequence input = inlineParser.getInput();
164        Matcher matcher = inlineParser.matcher(PATTERN);
165        if (matcher != null) {
166          BasedSequence type = input.subSequence(matcher.start(1), matcher.end(1));
167          BasedSequence idReference = input.subSequence(matcher.start(2), matcher.end(2));
168          assert type != null;
169          assert idReference != null;
170          inlineParser.appendNode(new InsertAnchorNode(type, idReference));
171          return true; // NOPMD - readability
172        }
173      }
174      return false;
175    }
176
177    public static class Factory implements InlineParserExtensionFactory {
178      @Override
179      public Set<Class<?>> getAfterDependents() {
180        return Collections.emptySet();
181      }
182
183      @Override
184      public CharSequence getCharacters() {
185        return "{";
186      }
187
188      @Override
189      public Set<Class<?>> getBeforeDependents() {
190        return Collections.emptySet();
191      }
192
193      @Override
194      public InlineParserExtension apply(LightInlineParser lightInlineParser) {
195        return new InsertAnchorInlineParser(lightInlineParser);
196      }
197
198      @Override
199      public boolean affectsGlobalScope() {
200        return false;
201      }
202    }
203  }
204
205  private static class InsertAnchorFormatter implements NodeFormatter {
206    private final InsertAnchorOptions options;
207
208    public InsertAnchorFormatter(DataHolder options) {
209      this.options = new InsertAnchorOptions(options);
210    }
211
212    @Override
213    public Set<NodeFormattingHandler<?>> getNodeFormattingHandlers() {
214      return options.enableInlineInsertAnchors
215          ? Collections.singleton(new NodeFormattingHandler<>(InsertAnchorNode.class, this::render))
216          : Collections.emptySet();
217    }
218
219    @SuppressWarnings("unused")
220    protected void render(InsertAnchorNode node, NodeFormatterContext context, MarkdownWriter markdown) {
221      if (options.enableRendering) {
222        markdown.append("{{ insert: ");
223        markdown.append(node.getType());
224        markdown.append(", ");
225        markdown.append(node.getIdReference());
226        markdown.append(" }}");
227      }
228    }
229
230    @Override
231    public Set<Class<?>> getNodeClasses() {
232      return Collections.singleton(InsertAnchorNode.class);
233    }
234
235    public static class Factory implements NodeFormatterFactory {
236
237      @Override
238      public NodeFormatter create(DataHolder options) {
239        return new InsertAnchorFormatter(options);
240      }
241
242    }
243  }
244
245  private static class InsertAnchorHtmlNodeRenderer implements HtmlNodeRenderer {
246    private final InsertAnchorOptions options;
247
248    public InsertAnchorHtmlNodeRenderer(DataHolder options) {
249      this.options = new InsertAnchorOptions(options);
250    }
251
252    @Override
253    public Set<HtmlNodeRendererHandler<?>> getHtmlNodeRendererHandlers() {
254      return options.enableInlineInsertAnchors
255          ? Collections.singleton(new HtmlNodeRendererHandler<>("insert", Element.class, this::processInsert))
256          : Collections.emptySet();
257    }
258
259    private void processInsert( // NOPMD used as lambda
260        Element node,
261        @SuppressWarnings("unused") HtmlNodeConverterContext context,
262        HtmlMarkdownWriter out) {
263
264      String type = node.attr("type");
265      String idRef = node.attr("id-ref");
266
267      out.append("{{ insert: ");
268      out.append(type);
269      out.append(", ");
270      out.append(idRef);
271      out.append(" }}");
272    }
273
274    public static class Factory implements HtmlNodeRendererFactory {
275
276      @Override
277      public HtmlNodeRenderer apply(DataHolder options) {
278        return new InsertAnchorHtmlNodeRenderer(options);
279      }
280    }
281  }
282
283  /**
284   * The flexmark node for an insert anchor.
285   */
286  public static class InsertAnchorNode
287      extends Node {
288
289    @NonNull
290    private final BasedSequence type;
291    @NonNull
292    private BasedSequence idReference;
293
294    /**
295     * Construct a new Metaschema insert node.
296     *
297     * @param type
298     *          the type of insertion
299     * @param idReference
300     *          the identifier of the given type to use to determine what to insert
301     */
302    @SuppressWarnings("null")
303    public InsertAnchorNode(@NonNull String type, @NonNull String idReference) {
304      this(CharSubSequence.of(type), CharSubSequence.of(idReference));
305    }
306
307    /**
308     * Construct a new Metaschema insert node.
309     *
310     * @param type
311     *          the type of insertion
312     * @param idReference
313     *          the identifier of the given type to use to determine what to insert
314     */
315    protected InsertAnchorNode(@NonNull BasedSequence type, @NonNull BasedSequence idReference) {
316      this.type = type;
317      this.idReference = idReference;
318    }
319
320    /**
321     * Get the type of insertion.
322     *
323     * @return the type of insertion
324     */
325    @NonNull
326    public BasedSequence getType() {
327      return type;
328    }
329
330    /**
331     * Get the identifier of the given type to use to determine what to insert.
332     *
333     * @return the identifier
334     */
335    @NonNull
336    public BasedSequence getIdReference() {
337      return idReference;
338    }
339
340    /**
341     * Set the identifier of the given type to use to determine what to insert.
342     *
343     * @param idReference
344     *          the identifier
345     */
346    public void setIdReference(@NonNull BasedSequence idReference) {
347      this.idReference = idReference;
348    }
349
350    @Override
351    @NonNull
352    public BasedSequence[] getSegments() {
353      return new BasedSequence[] { getType(), getIdReference() };
354    }
355
356    @Override
357    public void getAstExtra(StringBuilder out) {
358      segmentSpanChars(out, getType(), "type");
359      segmentSpanChars(out, getIdReference(), "id-ref");
360    }
361  }
362
363  /**
364   * Used to collect insert nodes.
365   */
366  public static class InsertVisitor
367      extends NodeVisitorBase {
368    @NonNull
369    private final List<InsertAnchorNode> inserts = new LinkedList<>();
370    @NonNull
371    private final Predicate<InsertAnchorNode> filter;
372
373    /**
374     * Construct a new visitor that will use the provided filter to visit matching
375     * insert nodes.
376     *
377     * @param filter
378     *          the match criteria to use to identify matching insert nodes
379     */
380    public InsertVisitor(@NonNull Predicate<InsertAnchorNode> filter) {
381      this.filter = filter;
382    }
383
384    /**
385     * Process markup to identify insert nodes.
386     *
387     * @param markup
388     *          the markup to process
389     * @return this visitor
390     */
391    public InsertVisitor processNode(@NonNull IMarkupString<?> markup) {
392      visit(markup.getDocument());
393      return this;
394    }
395
396    @Override
397    protected void visit(Node node) {
398      if (node instanceof InsertAnchorNode) {
399        InsertAnchorNode insert = (InsertAnchorNode) node;
400        if (filter.test(insert)) {
401          inserts.add((InsertAnchorNode) node);
402        }
403      } else {
404        visitChildren(node);
405      }
406    }
407
408    /**
409     * Get the collected insert nodes.
410     *
411     * @return the nodes
412     */
413    @NonNull
414    public List<InsertAnchorNode> getInserts() {
415      return inserts;
416    }
417  }
418}
